reviews.title: Greatly dissappointed
reviews.comment: I had high hopes for this application and it fails me   Only music but no model whatsoever
reviews.author: ariano hayadi

reviews.title: To people who needs to understand
reviews.comment: This app needs a Miku Hatsune board as shown on the video. Without it, you only have no models but musics only. Be sure to acquire the board as well.
reviews.author: John Moua

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: You need the board anime girl like the picture in video to play this program.
reviews.author: Borin Sim

reviews.title: It\'s an Augment Reality App.
reviews.comment: For those who complain below, please note that THIS IS \"AR\" means it is Augment Reality. It need picture of Hatsune Miku to load. It is the same picture as the picture sample. You can get it from the website or google. Just shoot it with the camera when the app load. Done!.......... as simple as that. What i dont like about this app is, the animation is not fluid. But it\'s an ok app for me.
reviews.author: Dmust Akira

reviews.comment: Where can you get the bored ?

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work

reviews.title: Very fun!
reviews.comment: This app is fun for me and I highly enjoy it! All you have to do is get the Hatsune Miku picture as shown in the pictures and video.
